channel.title: engineering on Threads Of Life
channel.description: Recent content in engineering on Threads Of Life

item.title: An event to remember!
item.description: On a lazy Sunday morning most of us would just wake up, have a cup of coffee and read the newspaper to see what's new. How many of you would be ready to face a quiz? A quiz that would test your skills in engineering across all it's disciplines. An inter-corporate event was held and involved participants from all across India competing in a battle of wits. It's hard to believe, right?

item.title: How to utilize the time post your final engineering exam
item.description: Final semester exams done and the long vacation begins…!!! (After 2 weeks or so) Friend: Hey dude, wassup these days? You: Hi! What are doing in your vacation? Any news about your joining date in XYZ company? For those of you who are really bored right now, just try copy-pasting any one of the above conversations in your favorite messaging app chat search and youâ€™ll probably be surprised with the number of results that come up.
